title: FS: Real Photo PC of 1913 Rockford Wolverines
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: FS: Real Photo PC of 1913 Rockford Wolverines
posts.post_content: Beautiful image. From the collection of the family of Varney Anderson of Old Judge fame.Card has a crease LR and a tiny tear in the left border. Back clean except for "1913" written in pencil.---$200. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] to reserve.

Think this is the 1913 Rockford Wolverines club of the the WI-IL league (Class C).  

Forest Citys folded after 1871, their one year as a major league club - with Cap Anson and Spalding.  Some refer to the 1868-1870 teams as the Forest Citys as well, but they were an amateur team.  

Only other time Rockford had a "Forest Citys" team was 1895-1897 in the Western League.

Love the card, and living close to Rockford, it's very cool to see.
Thanks Brad--I have adjusted the description.
